<div id="sneakpreview" class="metaphacts_help__startpage-platform-row">
<div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-sneakpreview-textbox-top">
        <h2>Welcome to the Sneak Preview Release</h2>
<p class="metaphacts_help__xxxxl-font metaphacts_help__large-margin-bottom">
The sneak preview release aims at providing our partners and customers to get started with
their journey into the word of knowledge graphs. It provides basic semantic data integration
capabilities and means to visualize and interact with the data using an initial set of widgets.
</p>
<p class="metaphacts_help__xl-font metaphacts_help__large-margin-bottom">
We‘re currently working on the implementation of a full platform, which will considerably
extend the sneak preview by means to semantically integrate legacy data sources, semantic
search, catalog-based management of queries and visualizations, application development,
and enterprise-level security and user management.
</p>
</div>
</div>

<div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-sneakpreview-logos">
      <div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-sneakpreview-logobox">&nbsp;</div>
      <div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-sneakpreview-logobox"><img src="/metaphacts/branding/metaphacts-logo.png" /></div>
      <div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-sneakpreview-logobox"><img src="/images/help/logo-blazegraph.png" /></div>
      <div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-sneakpreview-logobox">&nbsp;</div>
</div>
<div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-sneakpreview-textbox-bottom">
<p>
The sneak preview release is tightly bundled with 
<a href="http://www.blazegraph.com/" target="_blank">SYSTAP</a>‘s graph database Blazegraph
to deliver high performance semantic data storage and retrieval.
</p>
</div>

<div id="about" class="metaphacts_help__striped-background-box-1">
  <div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-about-container">
    <div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-about-row">
      <div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-about-box-left">
        <h2>About us...</h2>
        <div>
          <div class="metaphacts_help__default-margin-box metaphacts_help__xl-font metaphacts_help__default-margin-bottom">
            metaphacts is a Germany-based company offering products, solutions and services for describing,  
            interchanging and querying graph data, as well as a user-oriented open platform for visualizing
            and interacting with knowledge graphs.
          </div>
          <div class="metaphacts_help__default-margin-box metaphacts_help__xl-font">
            We strongly believe that semantic technologies will change the way we are dealing with data
            and information and build solutions based on open standards (such as RDF, RDFS, OWL, and SPARQL)
            that help you discover the full potential of these groundbreaking technologies.
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="metaphacts_help__startpage-about-box-right metaphacts_help__xl-font">
